mapper.select: select ,g.goods_detail_desc from np_goods g where g.goods_id=#{goodsId}
select goods.cat_id from np_goods goods,np_goods_info info where info.goods_id=goods.goods_id and info.goods_info_id=#{goodsInfoId}
select sum(goods_info_stock) from np_goods_info where goods_info_added='1' and goods_info_delflag='0' and goods_id=#{goodsId}

select distinct from np_goods g,np_goods_info i where g.goods_id=i.goods_id and g.goods_delflag='0' and g.goods_added='1'
and g.cat_id in
#{catId}
order by g.goods_create_time desc limit 0,5

select , IFNULL(w.ware_stock,0) AS ware_stock, IFNULL(w.ware_price,i.goods_info_prefer_price) AS ware_price, IFNULL(w.ware_vip_price,i.goods_info_vip_price) AS ware_vip_price from np_goods_info i
left join (select sum(goods_info_num) as count, og.goods_info_id from np_order_goods og left join (select order_id from np_order where order_status='3') os on og.order_id = os.order_id group by goods_info_id) o on o.goods_info_id=i.goods_info_id
left join (select count(1) as attecount,goods_id from np_customer_follow group by goods_id) a on a.goods_id=i.goods_info_id
left join (select ware_stock,product_id,ware_price,ware_vip_price from np_product_ware p where p.ware_id in (select c.ware_id from np_ware_city c,np_warehouse h where h.ware_id=c.ware_id and c.city_id=#{distinctId} AND h.del_flag='0' and c.del_flag='0') and p.del_flag='0' GROUP BY p.product_id ) w on w.product_id = i.goods_info_id
left join (select goods_id,cat_id,brand_id from np_goods) j on j.goods_id = i.goods_id
left join (select s.goods_id from (select h.goods_id,count(h.goods_id) as c from (select x.goods_id from np_goods_rele_expandparam as x where 1=1 and
x.expangparam_value_id =#{param}
and x.rele_expandparam_delflag='0') as h GROUP BY H.goods_id HAVING c >= #{paramLengh} ) s ) ex on ex.goods_id = i.goods_id
left join (select s.goods_info_id from (select h.goods_info_id,count(h.goods_info_id) as c from (select x.goods_info_id from np_goods_info_rele_spec_detail as x where 1=1 and
x.spec_detail_id = #{spec}
) as h GROUP BY h.goods_info_id HAVING c >= #{specsLengh} ) s ) sp on sp.goods_info_id = i.goods_info_id
where j.goods_id = i.goods_id and goods_info_delflag='0' and goods_info_added='1' and show_list='1' and ( audit_status='0'or audit_status='3' ) and j.cat_id in (SELECT cat_id FROM np_goods_category WHERE cat_parent_id IN (SELECT cat_id FROM np_goods_category WHERE cat_parent_id=#{catId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND cat_delflag='0') AND cat_delflag='0')
and j.brand_id=#{brandId}
and ex.goods_id is not null
and sp.goods_info_id is not null
and w.ware_stock>0
and i.goods_info_vip_price > #{searchBean.priceMin}
and i.goods_info_prefer_price > #{searchBean.priceMin}
and #{searchBean.priceMax} > i.goods_info_vip_price
and #{searchBean.priceMax} > i.goods_info_prefer_price
order by i.goods_info_vip_price
order by i.goods_info_prefer_price
order by i.goods_info_vip_price desc
order by i.goods_info_prefer_price desc
order by o.count desc
order by o.count
order by i.goods_info_added_time
order by i.goods_info_added_time desc
order by a.attecount
order by a.attecount desc
limit #{startRowNum},#{endRowNum}
